products_landing_page.title: Products | Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise
products_landing_page.tagline: Our wide range of products offer reliable technology solutions for your communications and infrastructure needs.

categories.category_tagline: Enhance office, campus, and data center connectivity with faster speeds and PoE through network ethernet and enterprise switches.

products.page_title: OmniSwitch 6900 Core & Data Center Switch | Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise
products.tagline: 1RU core switch and data center switch with low-latency, wire-rate, non-blocking design, featuring 10 GigE, 25 GigE, 40 GigE, and 100 GigE interfaces.
key_features: Meet high-demand data center/campus network requirements
Converge physical and virtualized data center operations
Autonomous Network with fully automated Layer 2-3 operations
Profile-based segmentation and traffic filtering policies
Advanced L3 routing: VRF, Multicast, IPv4/IPv6
Lossless Ethernet and VXLAN gateway hardware support
SDN programmable via OVSDB, OpenStack, RESTful API, Python, Ansible
Automatic fabric creation, Virtual chassis, SPB-M, IP routing protocols

downloadable_assets.title: Intelligent Fabric visibility and control for network overlays
SPB for Mission-critical Video Surveillance Networks

products.page_title: OmniSwitch 6920 High Performance Switch | Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise
products.h1: OmniSwitch 6920 High Performance Switch for Data Centers
products.tagline: Designed for AI/HPC data centers and scalable campus networks, this high performance switch supports advanced OmniFabric architecture.
key_features: Ultra-high-density 400G performance with 32 QSFP-DD ports supporting 10/25/50/100/200/400G breakouts
Simplified network management via RESTful APIs, Python/Bash CLI, WebView GUI, SNMP
High availability with redundant hot-swappable power supplies and fans
Data center fabric-ready with SPB-M virtualization and RoCEv2/PFC support
Advanced security through TACACS+/RADIUS/LDAP, MAC lockdown, ACL filtering
Intelligent QoS with hardware queues, flow-based QoS, traffic policing
Comprehensive IPv4/IPv6 routing with OSPF, IS-IS, BGP, VRF, GRE tunneling

products.page_title: OmniSwitch 9900 Modular Chassis Switch | Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise
products.tagline: Deliver efficient, reliable, and high performing network architecture with modular chassis switches.
key_features: Modular slots with versatile port options (100 GigE QSFP28, 40 GigE QSFP+, 10 GigE SFP+)
Virtual Chassis Technology for high availability
Network virtualization with Auto-Fabric IP routing

products.page_title: OmniSwitch 6360 Gigabit Ethernet Switch | Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise

High availability with virtual chassis concept
Access Guardian 2.0 (IEEE 802.1x, MAC, captive portal, UNP, BYOD, IoT)
